title: Rest Countries App
description: I was assigned to make a React Application that allows users to view data about countries around the world. I had to use the REST API: https://restcountries.com. I had to use Insomnia to test API HTTP endpoints. I used Bootstrap for my UI. I had to add another API so I decided to add in a Google Maps API so when you click on a country it shows where it is situated.
